member.name: T:Spectre.Console.Decoration
member.summary: Represents text decoration.
member.remarks: Support for text decorations is up to the terminal.

member.name: F:Spectre.Console.Decoration.None
member.summary: No text decoration.

member.name: F:Spectre.Console.Decoration.Bold
member.summary: Bold text. Not supported in every environment.

member.name: F:Spectre.Console.Decoration.Dim
member.summary: Dim or faint text. Not supported in every environment.

member.name: F:Spectre.Console.Decoration.Italic
member.summary: Italic text. Not supported in every environment.

member.name: F:Spectre.Console.Decoration.Underline
member.summary: Underlined text. Not supported in every environment.

member.name: F:Spectre.Console.Decoration.Invert
member.summary: Swaps the foreground and background colors. Not supported in every environment.

member.name: F:Spectre.Console.Decoration.Conceal
member.summary: Hides the text. Not supported in every environment.

member.name: F:Spectre.Console.Decoration.SlowBlink
member.summary: Makes text blink. Normally less than 150 blinks per minute. Not supported in every environment.

member.name: F:Spectre.Console.Decoration.RapidBlink
member.summary: Makes text blink. Normally more than 150 blinks per minute. Not supported in every environment.

member.name: F:Spectre.Console.Decoration.Strikethrough
member.summary: Shows text with a horizontal line through the center. Not supported in every environment.

member.name: T:Spectre.Console.Emoji
member.summary: Utility for working with emojis.
Utility for working with emojis.

member.name: M:Spectre.Console.Emoji.Remap(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Remaps a specific emoji tag with a new emoji.

member.name: M:Spectre.Console.Emoji.Replace(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Char})
member.summary: Replaces emoji markup with corresponding unicode characters.
member.param: A string with emojis codes, e.g. "Hello :smiley:!".
member.returns: A string with emoji codes replaced with actual emoji.

member.summary: Text cursor enable.

member.name: M:Spectre.Console.AnsiSequences.SGR(System.Byte[])
member.summary: This control function selects one or more character attributes at the same time.
member.returns: The ANSI escape code.

member.name: M:Spectre.Console.AnsiSequences.ED(System.Int32)
member.summary: This control function erases characters from part or all of the display. When you erase complete lines, they become single-height, single-width lines, with all visual character attributes cleared. ED works inside or outside the scrolling margins.
member.returns: The ANSI escape code.

member.name: M:Spectre.Console.AnsiSequences.CUU(System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the cursor up a specified number of lines in the same column. The cursor stops at the top margin. If the cursor is already above the top margin, then the cursor stops at the top line.
member.param: The number of steps to move up.
member.returns: The ANSI escape code.

member.name: M:Spectre.Console.AnsiSequences.CUD(System.Int32)
member.summary: This control function moves the cursor down a specified number of lines in the same column. The cursor stops at the bottom margin. If the cursor is already below the bottom margin, then the cursor stops at the bottom line.
member.param: The number of steps to move down.
member.returns: The ANSI escape code.

member.name: M:Spectre.Console.AnsiSequences.CUF(System.Int32)
member.summary: This control function moves the cursor to the right by a specified number of columns. The cursor stops at the right border of the page.
member.param: The number of steps to move forward.
member.returns: The ANSI escape code.

member.name: M:Spectre.Console.AnsiSequences.CUB(System.Int32)
member.summary: This control function moves the cursor to the left by a specified number of columns. The cursor stops at the left border of the page.
member.param: The number of steps to move backward.
member.returns: The ANSI escape code.

member.name: M:Spectre.Console.AnsiSequences.CUP(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the cursor to the specified position.
member.returns: The ANSI escape code.

member.name: M:Spectre.Console.AnsiSequences.RM(System.Int32)
member.summary: Hides the cursor.
member.returns: The ANSI escape code.

member.name: M:Spectre.Console.AnsiSequences.SM(System.Int32)
member.summary: Shows the cursor.
member.returns: The ANSI escape code.

member.name: M:Spectre.Console.AnsiSequences.EL(System.Int32)
member.summary: This control function erases characters on the line that has the cursor. EL clears all character attributes from erased character positions. EL works inside or outside the scrolling margins.
member.returns: The ANSI escape code.
